data.name: RPGScenery - Dungeon Island
data.detailed_description:
This small island is far from any known shipping route, partly due to the rocks scattered around it in the water and partly due to the will of its builders. The island was built on a magical focal point, carved out from the granite-like rock with the help of magic. The aisles are maze-like, sometimes seemingly leading to nothingness, the branches suggesting secrets or dangerous traps. A portal at the top of this particular structure can lead anywhere the builders want it.

This DLC contains 5 battlemaps to help you to bring your TTRPG session to the next level

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7/8.1/10
  • Processor: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 950 or Equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
